examples.example: 我非常期待这场即将到来的音乐会，相信它会给我带来美妙的体验。

translate.english: I am very much looking forward to this upcoming concert and believe it will bring me a wonderful experience.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起去参加音乐会，度过了一个非常愉快的夜晚。

translate.english: I went to the concert with my friends and spent a very pleasant night.

examples.example: 我有幸聆听了一场精彩绝伦的音乐会，那动人的旋律至今萦绕在我心间。

translate.english: I was fortunate to listen to a wonderful and extremely brilliant concert, and the touching melody still lingers in my heart until now.
